notes: Reserve day used (rain stopped play at 25.2 overs)
Dravid is doing the wicket keeping duties as Karim was hit by a Kumble delivery and is off the ground

milestones.description: This is the highest match aggregate (501) involving teams India & Bangladesh in ODIs

stories.title: Prince of Calcutta takes Dhaka by storm
stories.summary:
After pouring rain stopped play in the India-Bangladesh encounter
there were fears that rain might strike on the second day of
the match as well and ruin things for the organisers

stories.title: Rain splits India-Bangladesh encounter
stories.summary:
Exactly after half the Bangladesh innings was completed, torrential
downpour stopped play in the Asia Cup match in Dhaka on Tuesday

stories.title: Complete metamorphosis in Bangladesh batting
stories.summary:
Bangladesh's batting seemed to have taken a U-turn after their dismal
performance against Sri Lanka in the previous match

stories.title: Asia Cup: Bangladesh v India, Statistical Highlights
stories.summary: It was the 1597th ODI in cricket history

stories.title: Indians will have to bowl far better
stories.summary: The encounter between the hosts Bangladesh and India in the Asia Cup produced no surprises but for the weather threatening to abandon the match

stories.title: Prince of Calcutta takes Dhaka by storm

stories.summary:
Bangladesh's batting seemed to have taken a U-turn after their dismal
performance against Sri Lanka in the previous match

recentReportStory.title: Complete metamorphosis in Bangladesh batting
recentReportStory.summary:
Bangladesh's batting seemed to have taken a U-turn after their dismal
performance against Sri Lanka in the previous match
